Package uk.mqchinee.archelia.builders

Class ItemBuilder

java.lang.Object
uk.mqchinee.archelia.builders.ItemBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Builder<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack>
public class ItemBuilder extends Object implements Builder<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack>
A builder class for creating and customizing ItemStack objects in a Bukkit environment.
Since:
1.0
